__e: I guess we knew this was a risk, but now...
We knew the war was past winning; but it was our obligation and sacred duty to fight to the very last bullet.
We both knew we should tell her the truth... but every day felt like the wrong day.
But I do know that we knew what had happened.
Well, God and I knew better, but I couldn't stop, because I had a private devil all my own.
And even if we did, it's none of our business.
We knew we had a good story this time... because it had everything in it.
I know that I kept things from you in the Arctic. But I thought we understood that we were in this together now.
We knew that we were we going out alone and that there was no help.
Our mom knew why, but she never told us and we never asked her... because we knew it made her sad.
Oh, we knew things, I'd seen things, things I'd never seen before and never since, but... .. we had a way at looking the future in the eye.
We took a client out of respect for you... because we knew that's what you would've wanted.
When we first came, we had no idea the land would be so kind.
And now we do, and so... please, let's talk.
I'm sorry we didn't get anything for you, dear, but as I mentioned, we didn't know that Philip was seeing anyone.
We thought we took out the threat, but we didn't know then what we know now.
But we didn't know what was in the lease.
We didn't know ourselves who we were, we simple were.
And now we do, and so... please, let's talk.
He has, and I told him that that was our job, and we're still deciding whether or not to make that call.
He didn't respond. And that's when he reached into his pocket, We didnt know if he has a weapon.
That's as far as it went, because I think we both knew I was the wrong man for you.
He meant those things, but it seems to me now it was more and that we all knew it.
We all knew what was at stake, and we agreed to do whatever was necessary to keep them safe.
